name: Farm Alyx
description:
Story:

Alyx was in an epidemic , he though by cleaning place around him makes his world better ,He found out that , more he clean the area more immunity he gets , There were crowd of people who were infected with the virus, he can avoid them by social distancing 

this is an Relaxing game , there is not much challenge in it 

How To Play<<<<

Download the game 

unzip the file then 

click on the exe

>>>Controls<<<

W,A,S,D for Cam movement

(left click)point click on screen to move the character

right click- for super power when you reach level 60
